parameters.name: ConnectionStringPrefix
parameters.description: The prefix of the proxy endpoint Enter a custom prefix.

parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID. You can call the DescribeDBInstances operation to query the instance ID.

parameters.name: DBProxyConnectStringNetType
parameters.description:
The network type of the proxy endpoint. Valid values:

*   **Public**: Internet
*   **VPC**: Virtual Private Cloud (VPC)
*   **Classic**: classic network

Default value: **Classic**

parameters.name: DBProxyEndpointId
parameters.description: The proxy endpoint ID. You can call the DescribeDBProxyEndpoint operation to query the proxy endpoint ID.

parameters.name: DBProxyEngineType
parameters.description: A reserved parameter. You do not need to specify this parameter.

parameters.name: DBProxyNewConnectStringPort
parameters.description:
The port number that is associated with the proxy endpoint.

*   If the instance runs MySQL, the default value is **3306**.
*   If the instance runs PostgreSQL, the default value is **5432**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. You can call the DescribeRegions operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: VPCId
parameters.description:
The ID of the VPC to which the proxy endpoint belongs. You can call the DescribeDBInstanceAttribute operation to query the information.

>  This parameter must be specified when **DBProxyConnectStringNetType** is set to **VPC**.

parameters.name: VSwitchId
parameters.description:
The ID of the vSwitch that is associated with the specified VPC. You can call the DescribeDBInstanceAttribute operation to query the vSwitch ID.

>  This parameter must be specified when **DBProxyConnectStringNetType** is set to **VPC**.
